mapper.select: select * from INSBInsuredhis where taskid = #{taskid} order by modifytime desc

update INSBInsuredhis set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti}, taskid = #{taskid},personid = #{personid},businessproposalformno = #{businessproposalformno}, businesspolicyno = #{businesspolicyno},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},relation = #{relation}, pincode = #{pincode},applystatus = #{applystatus},pindatetime = #{pindatetime}, commitstatus = #{commitstatus},pinerrmsg = #{pinerrmsg} where id = #{id}
